project1.title: Pet Adoption
project1.description: This single page app allows you to filter by pet type, and even add your own pet!
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

project2.title: Sorting Hat
project2.description: Just like the Sorting Hat in the Harry Potter series, this app will take your name and assign you to a Hogwarts house.  Students can also be expelled so be on your best behavior!
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

project3.title: Bear Watcher
project3.description: Track bears in the Katmai National Park in Alaska and watch as they feast on countless salmon.
project3.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript ES6 Modules, Version Control with Github

project4.title: Firebase Pinterest
project4.description: Keep a virtual collection of interests and ideas with this simulation of Pinterest that uses Firebase and showcases full CRUD.
project4.technologiesUsed: Git, HTML, CSS, Webpack, JavaScript ES6 Modules, and Firebase.

project5.title: Apparty
project5.description: A socially distant birthday tracking and celebration app.  Create a birthday event for a friend, invite all your other friends, and remind that special someone that life still has meaning!
project5.technologiesUsed: React, React Router DOM, Bootstrap/reactstrap, Moment.js, Axios, Firebase, Cloudinary, HTML, CSS/SCSS
